title: Boilerplate for launching client websites fast
description: Duplicate this repo, update content/branding, and ship production-ready sites with a maintained dependency workflow.

features.title: App Router + TypeScript
features.description: Build pages under src/app with typed components and modern Next.js defaults.

features.title: Tailwind v4
features.description: Utility-first styling with minimal setup, ideal for rapid client iterations.

features.title: Update Automation
features.description: Dependabot creates update PRs and patch/minor releases can auto-merge after checks pass.
